as a german resident and user of online social media platforms, it is essential to me that my personal data is protected and not exploited for commercial purposes without my consent. the european union's general data protection regulation (gdpr) ensures the privacy of individuals in the eu by regulating how companies collect and use their personal information. however, this regulation should be extended globally to protect citizens worldwide. social media platforms have a responsibility to ensure that user data is protected and not misused for political or financial gains.<|endoftext|>
